title: I just realized, fiora doesn't have a champion theme
body:
I've looked all over and found none, almost every champion has a theme to go with them, but not fiora. FeelsBadMan
Edit: Theme song

replies.body:
There's a **lot** of champions without a theme.

{{champion:30}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:68}} just to name a few.
There's some skins that have themes, but if that's the case, Project: Fiora already shares the Project: Overdrive theme.
I think Fiora was literally the last champion who wasn't released with a login theme
time to start a petition for rito to give fiora theme song

fiora, the grand duelist?

her combat theme is that she is a fencer who can hit weak points, lunge, sidestep and parry.
like a fencer does.
because...she's a fencer...

Fencer/duelist

done.

Edit: do you mean a song or something actually?
